title: Night and Day - "to whom she gave the names of"

content.question: In the middle of the second sentence of paragraph 2, the phrase “to whom she gave the names of” primarily emphasizes Katharine’s

choices.label: sense of connection to an exalted literary tradition
growing interest in great literary figures
lack of respect for the work of certain well-known authors
inability to distinguish between the works of various authors

content.answer: sense of connection to an exalted literary tradition

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
